==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=不shì
|c=bat1 si6
|mn=put-sī
|cat=n,v,adv
}}

===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# [[fault]]; [[mistake]]; [[wrongdoing]]
#: {{zh-x|都 是 我 的 不是。|It's all my '''fault'''.}}
#: {{zh-x|快 去 賠 個 不是。|Quickly go and apologise.}}

====Synonyms====
* {{sense|fault; mistake; wrongdoing}} {{zh-l|過錯}}, {{zh-l|過失}}

====Derived terms====
{{zh-der|賠不是}}

===Verb===
{{zh-verb}}

# to [[not]] be
#: {{zh-x|這 不是 我 的 書。|This '''is not''' my book.}}
#: {{zh-x|這 不是 我 的 書 嗎？|This '''is not''' my book? (e.g. when you are told that the book is not yours.)}}
#: {{zh-x|不是 我 不 明白，我 只是 不 想 說。|'''It's not that''' I don't know; it's just that I don't want to say it.}}
# {{n-g|Used in interrogative sentences, to express a certain emotion. Equivalent to “... not ... ?”}}
#: {{zh-x|我 不是 說 了 別 叫 我 弟弟{di} 嗎？|'''Didn't''' I already tell you not to call me "little bro"?}}
#: {{zh-x|看，那 不是 ^姚 ^明 嗎？|Look! '''Isn't''' that Yao Ming?}}
#: {{zh-x|這 不是 我 的 書 嗎？|'''Isn't''' this my book? (e.g. when you find other person holding your book)}}

====Usage notes====
In sense 2, {{lang|zh|不是}} is usually weakened, pronounced with neutral tone, while in sense 1, {{lang|zh|不是}} is stressed.

====See also====
* {{zh-l|是不是|tr=shìbushì}}
